item.description: DINNER & THEATER evening in New Britain starting at 6 pm at Paradise Pizza & Restaurant - superb food! After dinner, we’ll go to Hole in the Wall Theater to see “Jacob Marley’s Christmas Carol.” Come watch the familiar story told through the eyes of Scrooge’s late partner, Jacob Marley. You buy your dinner, theater $20. Reserve early, call Gail, 860-582-8229. Directions to Paradise, 10 East St.: I-84 to 72E, take Exit 9 Main St., ramp top turn right, at light turn left onto Chestnut St., go to end, turn right onto East St., go to end, facility on right corner.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside, ask for the group.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Dinner & Theater
